description: Schema of the Data property of an Event Grid event for a device life cycle event (DeviceCreated, DeviceDeleted) with additional metadata for generating mock values.

deviceId.description: The unique identifier of the device. This case-sensitive string can be up to 128 characters long, and supports ASCII 7-bit alphanumeric characters plus the following special characters: - : . + % _ # * ? ! ( ) , = @ ; $ '.

hubName.description: Name of the IoT Hub where the device was created or deleted.

opType.description: The event type specified for this operation by the IoT Hub.

operationTimestamp.description: The ISO8601 timestamp of the operation.

twin.description: Information about the device twin, which is the cloud represenation of application device metadata.
